skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. It only provides brand color values and typography guidelines. No file access, network calls, command execution, or environment variable access.

content.value_statement: Applying Anthropic brand styling requires looking up official colors and fonts. This skill provides all brand guidelines in one place so you can quickly apply consistent visual identity to any artifact.
actual_capabilities: Applies Anthropic brand colors (#141413 dark, #faf9f5 light, #b0aea5 mid gray)
Applies Poppins font to headings with Arial fallback
Applies Lora font to body text with Georgia fallback
Smart color selection based on background
Font fallback system for cross-platform compatibility
limitations: Requires python-pptx library for PowerPoint manipulation
Does not create new documents from scratch
Does not install fonts (fonts must be pre-installed)

use_cases.title: Style Presentations
use_cases.description: Apply Anthropic brand colors and fonts to PowerPoint presentations for consistent visual identity

use_cases.title: Brand Compliance
use_cases.description: Ensure marketing materials follow Anthropic brand guidelines with proper color and typography usage

use_cases.title: Generate On-Brand Artifacts
use_cases.description: Create slides and documents that match Anthropic visual standards for demos and documentation

prompt_templates.title: Style a Presentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the brand-guidelines skill to apply Anthropic styling to my presentation. Apply Poppins to all headings and Lora to body text. Use the brand accent colors for shapes.

prompt_templates.title: Create Brand Slides
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new slide deck with Anthropic brand colors. Use #141413 for dark backgrounds and #d97757 for accent elements. Apply Poppins 24pt for titles.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Typography
prompt_templates.prompt: Use brand-guidelines to apply Anthropic typography. Set headings to Poppins font and body text to Lora. Include fallback fonts for systems without these fonts installed.

prompt_templates.title: Verify Brand Colors
prompt_templates.prompt: Check my document against Anthropic brand guidelines. Verify text colors match #141413 for dark text and shapes use the correct accent palette.

output_examples.input: Style this slide with Anthropic brand guidelines
output: Applied Poppins font (28pt) to title - Arial fallback available
Applied Lora font (14pt) to body text - Georgia fallback available
Applied accent color #d97757 (orange) to decorative shapes

best_practices: Pre-install Poppins and Lora fonts in your environment for best results
Use the accent color rotation (orange, blue, green) for visual variety
Apply #141413 for text on light backgrounds and #faf9f5 for text on dark backgrounds
Always use the font fallback system to ensure readability across all systems
anti_patterns: Do not use non-brand colors for primary text or backgrounds
Do not mix heading and body fonts inconsistently across documents
Do not apply accent colors to text (they are for shapes and decorative elements only)

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides brand guidelines that can be applied through any compatible AI assistant.

faq.question: What fonts does this skill support?
faq.answer: Primary fonts are Poppins for headings and Lora for body text. Fallbacks are Arial for headings and Georgia for body text.

faq.question: Does this skill install fonts?
faq.answer: No. The skill uses existing system fonts. For best results, install Poppins and Lora fonts in your environment before use.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill is purely documentation-based. It only reads brand guidelines and does not access files, network, or external services.

faq.question: Why do shapes use accent colors cyclically?
faq.answer: The skill cycles through orange, blue, and green accent colors to maintain visual interest while staying on-brand with Anthropic's design system.

faq.question: How does this differ from other styling skills?
faq.answer: This skill specifically applies Anthropic's official brand identity. Other styling skills apply generic design principles without brand-specific color and typography guidelines.
